page.title: 05Blackridge Primary School
page.content: The{school}was first built in 1895. In 1970 it was reopened after being modernized. It was reopened by {William Drummond. }135 people attended the school when it first was opened and now 153 children attend it. The school has 6 classrooms. The building looks old from the outside but it is new in the inside. Buildings were joined by corridors and in 1980 a building was knocked down because of dry rot. A {transportable building}was erected and 2 new classrooms were made. This school used to be a{Primary {School}and a{Junior Secondary School. Now it is only a{Primary school. }This school has its own playing field. It has 1 football pitch and 2 netball pitches.
